rules.description: LeftCtrl to Sticky Hyper with sticky
Yabai Sticky Control + Option to Fn

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell appearance preferences to set dark mode to true'
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell appearance preferences to set dark mode to false'

rules.description: escape = emoji menu. (Simplifies default command + control + space)
